title: They'll Call It Treason
description: A journalist's body is found abandoned in a Washington alleyway.A state representative is brutally murdered in Raleigh.A Virginia Congressman's life is threatened by a radical militia group.When one crucial moment turns FBI Agent Ethan Shaw into a fugitive, he finds himself on the run, fighting back against the country he swore to protect. Framed for a crime he did not commit, Ethan will risk everything to prove his innocence and protect the ones he loves - but the truth he will uncover poses a far deeper threat.They took everything from him: his partner, his career, his freedom.How far would you go to get it all back?
author: Jordon Greene
